select
distinct
from sys_process
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_process (prc_id, prc_code, prc_a, prc_at, prc_ar, prc_b, prc_bt, prc_br, prc_c, prc_ct, prc_cr, prc_d, prc_dt, prc_dr, prc_e, prc_et, prc_fr, prc_g, prc_gt, prc_hr, prc_i, prc_it, prc_ir, prc_j, prc_jt, prc_jr) values (#{prcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prcA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prcAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prcAr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prcB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prcBt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prcBr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prcC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prcCt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prcCr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prcD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prcDt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prcDr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prcE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prcEt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prcFr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prcG,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prcGt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prcHr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prcI,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prcIt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prcIr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prcJ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prcJt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prcJr,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
